title: Pregnant Man
description:
A pregnant man holding his round stomach. Sometimes used in jest to represent feeling too full after overeating, as in a "food baby."

Variants include ðŸ«„ Pregnant Person and ðŸ«ƒ Pregnant Woman.

This emoji was approved to make the emoji keyboard more consistent and gender inclusive.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendering of the pregnant man emoji is a thoughtfully designed visual that breaks traditional gender norms, depicting a person with a masculine presentation sporting a visibly rounded belly. The emoji is crafted with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, giving it a gentle and approachable aesthetic. Realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading enhance the depiction of the pregnancy, symbolizing inclusivity and evolving family structures, offering a modern and empathetic representation for communication on Apple devices.
